comment.body: It usually takes at a minimum of 30 minutes before the notification. Also, on the Adguard app on Firestick TV 4K there is no "filtering log" visible, if there is one, please tell me where to find it. I would have to use my android phone to get that event log. Will that be OK?

comment.body: never mind. I load the extension to my Firefox and ran Zenradio. The notification came up and told me to remove my adblocker. I had the filtering log open but there is no way to capture the data or save the data to a file. Thanks anyway. If I ever figure this out I will send the data in a new report.
